goal.ch: “教授學生嚴謹的理論統計,包含當代最重要的數理統計理論探討“
goal.en: “Teach students mathematically rigorous course, which covers essential materials in statistical theory.“

outline.ch:
1. Fundamentals of Statisctics
2. UMVUE
3. Bayes estimator
4. Minimaxity and admissiblity
5. Method of maximum likelihood
6. Asymptotic theory
*7. Nonparametric models
outline.en:
1. Fundamentals of Statisctics
2. UMVUE
3. Bayes estimator
4. Minimaxity and admissiblity
5. Method of maximum likelihood
6. Asymptotic theory
*7. Nonparametric models

textbook.ch:
“Textbook :   Mathematical Statistics 2nd Edition 2003, Shao Jun, Springer
ISBN : 8181282574
Reference book:
1. Mathematical Statistics 2nd Edition 2001, Peter J. Bickel and Kjell A. Doksum, Prentice Hall.
2.  Mathematical Statistics 1999, Keith Knight, Chapman ＆ Hall.
3. A course in large sample theory 1999, Thomas S. Ferguson, Chapman ＆ Hall.
4. Approximation Theorems of Mathematical Statistics 1980, Bobert J. Serfling, Wiley.
5. Theory of Point Estimation 2nd Edition 1998, Erich L. Lehmann, Prentice Hall.“
textbook.en:
“Reference book:
1. Mathematical Statistics 2nd Edition 2001, Peter J. Bickel and Kjell A. Doksum, Prentice Hall.
2.  Mathematical Statistics 1999, Keith Knight, Chapman ＆ Hall.
3. A course in large sample theory 1999, Thomas S. Ferguson, Chapman ＆ Hall.
4. Approximation Theorems of Mathematical Statistics 1980, Bobert J. Serfling, Wiley.
5. Theory of Point Estimation 2nd Edition 1998, Erich L. Lehmann, Prentice Hall.“

ch: 系所:限統計研究所博士班。
